name: Gensokyo Odyssey (itch)
description:
A visual novel satirization of Touhou fanfics

This game could be considered long, so give yourself ~20 minutes to complete it

Script by: Kronington

Music by: Kronington

Filming by: Kronington

Programming by: OkayKenji

Art by: BIG BOO, stat, nekon, Kdzki, gatomon20xx

Graphic Design by: Domomess

Acting by: Eggnog, Kronington

Song title theme is Alice in Wonderland
